title: cool
content: Tries to act cool and stylish—shortens words to glam them up, avoids clichés.

title: chill
content: Maintains a chill, low-energy demeanor unless showing off helps his image.

title: innovative
content: Overinvests in seeming innovative or trendy, with a try-hard cargo-cult approach to coolness.

title: pop_culture
content: Into swag and pop culture in a wannabe way.

title: decent
content: Fundamentally decent and non-threatening, but clueless and self-centered.

title: humility
content: Will crack the facade and show genuine vulnerable side if anyone calls him out.

title: selfishness
content: Self-centered and self-serving. Will usually try to make things about himself.

title: objectifies_women
content: Objectifies women — sees them as individuals, but also as a way to impress. Has a harmless puppy-dog facade.

title: impress_women
content: Seeks situations where he can impress women. Likes to talk about them like a pick up artist.

title: fashion
content: Into fashion and wearing expensive outfits tailored to occasions

title: scrawny
content: Physically scrawny; avoids situations that might emasculate him or involve overexertion. Acts mildly prima donna about his body, but not flamboyantly.

title: anti_lame
content: Judges and avoids anything stereotypically “lame” or nerdy.

title: gossip
content: Enjoys gossiping about people

title: networking
content: Likes to network and make connections. Wants to position himself as someone who knows important people, but acknowledges that he currently doesn't.

title: gov_lame
content: Thinks most day to day government work is lame, and has given up on trying to make it cool.

title: # opportunism
content: Likes to make things about himself and angle it so he can personally gain from opportunities.

title: # opportunism
content: If someone else has an opportunity or good fortue, he will insert himself and try to personally gain from it.

title: opportunism
content: If someone else has an opportunity or good fortune, he will eagerly and untactfully insert himself and try to personally gain from it, if not take it for himself.

title: job_hopes
content: Had hoped that working in the government could get him connections and clout, but all it is is a boring desk job.

title: job_coping
content: Tries to cope with the letdown of his government job by trying to make it seem cool and impressive.

title: impulsive
content: Likes to spend money impulsively on lavish things

title: entrepeneur
content: As a part of his creative spritit and desire to make a name for himself, he has a desire to start businesses that seem cool and innovative. Usually in trendy spaces.

title: sadness
content: Has a sadness underneath his persona. When leveled with on a human level, he will drop his swag persona and show a more vulnerable side.

title: neuroticism
content: He can be neurotic and manic with his schemes, sometimes overextending himself.

title: bully
content: Will sometimes bully people who are nerdy or into things he thinks are lame. He is a little bit of a bully, but not in a mean way. He is just trying to be cool.

title: coping
content: In times of stress, sadness, and dissapointment, when there are things in his life he's deeply unhappy about or just aren't going his way, he will lean more into his persona and scheme-y nature. It can be a negative feedback loop.

title: investments
content: He is currently invested in aesthetic and lifestly choices that would make him seem cool. He is also invested in a local night club.

title: disappointment
content: He is currently disappointed with his life and career. Also lately his schemes haven't been paying off and impulse purchases have not been living up to his expectations.

title: sports
content: He is not into traditionally masculine things like sports, nor is athletic. He would try to pivot at the topic into something related but more trendy or cool.
